catalog_info.title: Chinese Buddhist Texts - Readings in Medieval Buddho-Daoist Documents: Seminar
catalog_info.notes: Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 3233.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Reading knowledge of classical Chinese required.
catalog_info.description: This seminar focuses on the careful textual study and translation of a variety of Chinese Buddho-Daoist texts through the medieval period.
